name: Mastering Multiple Movement Options
description:
This game is made by 3 other people and me. Use Dashes, Ground Pounds and Wall jumps to get through the level. If these options are not enough for you, use the Portals placed trough out the level to get to new destinations.

Supports Xbox Controller and keyboard.

Controls:

Move: Left & right

Jump: Keyboard(Space) or Controller(A)

Side Dashes: Keyboard (F) or Controller(X, Right Bumper & Right Trigger)

Up dash: Keyboard(W) or Controller(Y)

Ground Pound: Keyboard(Shift) or Controller(B, Left Bumper & Left Trigger)

Go back to Main Menu: Keyboard(E) or Controller(Start)
